synopsis.text:
He avens collide as the fearless Space Captain Warrius Zero and the legendary space rebel, Captain Harlock, find themselves in the midst of an epic showdown. Zero, having lost his family to the hands of ruthless cyborgs, seeks vengeance and is captured by pirates, who aim to take down Harlock once and for all. Meanwhile, Harlock is committed to safeguarding a mysterious laboratory on a peculiar mushroom planet, as a promise to his dear friend Toshiro.

As Zero orchestrates his escape, he crosses paths with an unlikely ally â€“ an old pirate bride, who guides him to Harlock. The tension between the two space warriors escalates into a duel, only to be interrupted by a rival pirate gang, forcing them to unite against a common enemy.

Amidst the chaos, a hidden technological marvel on the planet holds the key to another dimension, and Harlock stands guard to protect it. Will Zero and Harlock join forces to vanquish the pirates? Will Zero uncover the secret of the interdimensional portal? Prepare for a thrilling ride as the two OVAs follow the TV series, offering a standalone adventure filled with action, camaraderie, and secrets waiting to be unveiled.
